product_name: Sherpani Soleil Ultralight Tote Bag - Women's
long_description: More than just a tote, the Sherpani Soleil Ultralight Tote Bag transforms into a hands-free backpack or a cross-body shoulder bag, depending upon your travel needs. Bag features padded backpack straps and a padded cross-body strap, all adjustable. Pass-through in rear lets you slide the bag over the handle of your wheeled luggage (luggage sold separately). Padded 10 in. by 11.5 in. sleeve can hold a tablet or laptop up to 13 in. Features 11 pockets to organize your gear, including a padded cellphone pocket and interior and exterior water bottle holders. Hardware is made from recycled aluminum. Sherpani Soleil Ultralight Tote Bag has a zippered top to secure the contents.
short_description: More than just a tote, the Sherpani Soleil Ultralight Tote Bag transforms into a hands-free backpack or a cross-body shoulder bag, depending upon your travel needs.
